responsibilities: Deliver an exceptional pre-sales customer experience for Large Enterprise prospects and customers by providing technical expertise, outlining the value proposition, and answering product, API, and LLM-related questions.

Demonstrate how leveraging OpenAI APIs and ChatGPT can meet customers’ business needs and deliver substantial business value, including building and presenting demos, scoping use cases, recommending architecture patterns, and providing in-depth technical advisory.
Create and maintain documentation, guides, and FAQs related to common questions and requirements discovered during the pre-sales process.
Develop and nurture strong customer relationships during the evaluation, validation, and purchasing process.

Foster customer advocacy and represent the voice of the customer with internal teams by gathering and relaying customer feedback, identifying themes across customers, and incorporating them into product planning.

Serve as the first line of defense for security and compliance questions, explaining standardized collateral, guiding customers toward relevant resources, and escalating complex requirements to the appropriate teams.
qualifications: Effective presentation and communication skills to translate business and technical topics to all audiences, including senior leaders.
Ability to own problems end-to-end and willingness to pick up necessary knowledge to complete tasks.
Humble attitude, eagerness to help colleagues, and desire to contribute to team success.
Thorough understanding of IT security principles and customer requirements for technical B2B SaaS products.
Experience in programming languages like Python or Javascript.
Knowledge of network/cloud architecture and experience delivering prototypes of Generative AI/traditional ML solutions.
analysis: The job responsibilities include delivering a pre-sales customer experience for Large Enterprise prospects and customers by providing technical expertise and answering product, API, and LLM-related questions. This indicates a direct involvement with language models (LLMs). Additionally, the job involves demonstrating how leveraging OpenAI APIs and ChatGPT can meet customers’ business needs, which are specific examples of Generative AI technologies. The skills section mentions experience delivering prototypes of Generative AI/traditional ML solutions, further confirming the involvement with Generative AI. Overall, both the responsibilities and skills clearly indicate that the job involves working with Generative AI and language models.
